text: Banteay Meanchey is a province (khaet) of Cambodia. The capital city is Serei Saophoan. Banteay Meanchey means "fortress of victory" in Khmer. The Tonl√© Sap Biosphere Reserve is in the province. The main rivers are the Mongkol Borei and the Sisophon Rivers. The province is divided into 7 districts and 2 municipalities: Royal Government of Cambodia *Malai *Mongkol Borey *Ou Chrov *Phnom Srok *Poipet Municipality *Preah Netr Preah *Serei Saophoan Municipality *Svay Chek *Thma Puok ==References== Category:Provinces of Cambodia Category:Establishments in Cambodia Category:1993 establishments in Asia
title: Banteay Meanchey province
